title: Resonance Scepter
info: The Resonance Scepter is a Hardmode post-Plantera staff which has a 12.5*1/8 (12.5%) chance of dropping from the Princess NPC. When used, it creates glowing pink circles at the cursor's location, which expand and then collapse into sparkles over the course of about 1 second. Rapid damage is dealt to any enemies within the circles throughout the animation. It is not possible to summon the circles through tiles. The scepter in the player's hand also sparkles while it is used, emitting pink light.
